overview.content: Stress, screens, and pollution exhaust your skin’s repair systems. Polynucleotides replenish them by delivering purified salmon DNA fragments that hydrate the extracellular matrix, calm inflammation, and jumpstart collagen. Expect softer lines, refined pores, and a bouncy glow—without volumising fillers.

longDescription: Polynucleotides (PN) are purified DNA fragments that act like a skin reboot button. Once injected, they attract water, awaken fibroblasts, and neutralise inflammation so texture smooths, pores tighten, and your complexion gains that ‘lit-from-within’ radiance. We customise PN protocols for face, neck, chest, and hands—perfect for anyone whose skin looks dull, stressed, or sensitive.
